Class CommissionSales

java.lang.Object
  CommissionSales

public class CommissionSales
extends java.lang.Object

Class describing methods and fields used to calculate sales commission based on monthly sales

Method Detail

calculatePay

public double calculatePay()
Method calculatePay which calculates the total commission to be paid to the employee based on the total monthly sales and commission rate.

Returns:
payInCAD which is the total commission earned by the salesperson for the month

displayDetails

public void displayDetails()
Method displayDetails used to display the sales person's name and pay in Canadian dollars
